name: Smag bros (Combat test)
description:
It's a game about fighting the other funny looking square and hitting them with a cube.

Green square takes less knockback but does less damage.

Red square takes more knockback and does more damage.

The game needs a controller, I have no clue what will happen with any other controller besides a modern gamecube controller.

Controls:

Player 1

left and right arrow keys to move

up arrow key to jump (press it again to double jump)

Z to dash

X to attack

Player 2

B to jump

A to dash

ZR to attack

I have no clue what to do with this.
